## WhereBuilder.inq() method

Add a `inq` condition

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
inq<K extends KeyOf<MT>>(key: K, val: MT[K][]): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>K</code> | Property name |
|  val | <code>MT[K][]</code> | An array of property values |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
